value:
A festival offering gratitude to the
wind... That's a good idea. Wind is
important to pegasus knights too.

I used to enjoy flying beside Lady
Minerva's wyvern. It had the strength
required to lead me and my sisters.

This light clothing is much more
practical than stiff, heavy armor.
The wind protects me, anyhow.

Even sentiments may be carried on
the wind... Do you believe that to be
true, $Nu?

The wind blowing through the
Askran sky is wonderful. Flying
feels special here.

I am Catria, of the Whitewings. I've
come with an invitation to the wind
festival from $Nf.

It looks like I used the wind to my
advantage. I wonder if Palla and
Est noticed...

I feel the wind rush through me.
That way I can become one with it.

If you don't know the wind, you
can't soar through the skies.

Many thanks. I will use this wind
at my back.

As a pegasus knight, I know how
precious the wind is. I will enjoy the
festival with my gratitude in mind.

The wind has been by my side ever
since my first flight on a pegasus.$k$pIt followed me through the skies
in every bright moment and through
every difficulty.$k$pIt was there in the days after the start
of the war...drifting across the skies
of Macedon, of Aurelis...$k$pEach breeze different in its own way.
At times it became a headwind to
challenge me...$k$pBut in the end it always saved me.
The wind always propelled me when
my heart was full of doubt.$k$pI pray to continue through life with
the wind as my companion. During
this festival, I'll offer up my gratitude.
I'll blow you away!
Ride the wind!
Far too slow.
Scatter on the breeze!
Vexing...
A people that lives as one with the wind... That feels right to me.
*surprise* That startled me, you know!
Lady Minerva once remarked that on the back of a pegasus, the wind feels gentle.
When I am in battle, I make the wind my ally.
If I fly way, way up into the sky, the chilly drafts are so bracing.
If only my thoughts could ride the wind and reach him.
I hope the breeze that blows to you brings amity with it.
Good thinking.
Hmm...
Off I fly!
